entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @realDonaldTrump You are a very pathetic leader and a BIG LIER!  It is not possible to stop a pandemic without making sure that this very contagious virus does not spread. It is not about older Americans, productive young Americans will get sick and need care. Hospitals will collapse sooner! WTF!
